english: I saw you looking at Selcan Hatun.

text: Yürürken bana bir türlü diyemediğin derdin…
english: When you were walking, you said you couldn't tell me...
...Selcan Hatun?

text: Bilesin ki obaya gelip seni gördüğüm ilk gün sancım başlamıştır
english: I want you to know that the first day I came into the room and saw you, my pain started.

text: Sen benim için ulaşılmaz bir hayaldin Gündoğdu Bey’im
english: You were an unreachable dream for me Mr. Gündü
You were the son of Solomon Shah.
You were married to his adopted daughter.
To cut you out of my heart...
Do you know how long I've been struggling with myself?

text: O gün gelip beni babamdan istedin ya…
english: You came and asked my father for me that day...
I don't care about your jihan anymore.

text: Ne Selcan Hatun’un senin karın olarak kalması…
english: No Selcan Hatun will remain your wife...
...or anything else.
And now?
My heart is in trouble, my lord.

text: Seni onun çadırının önünde gördüğümden beridir, ben…
english: Ever since I saw you outside his tent, I...
I'm sorry, I was out of line again.
Seven would be jealous.

text: Kusura bakmayasın beyim Hayırlı geceler olsun
english: I'm sorry, sir. Have a good night.
Goncagül Hatun
Remember my words well.

text: Selcan bir ömür benim hatunum olacağına söz verdi…
english: Selcan promised to be my girl for a lifetime...
I'd rather be a soldier than a soldier.
I know.
And I'll give you credit.

text: Benimki genç bir kızın ahmaklığı işte
english: Mine's the folly of a young girl.
I'm sorry.
Good night.
I've dreamed of this day for years

text: Ailemle aynı otağda aynı sofrada oturmayı
english: Sitting at the same table as my parents.
Even if I die, I won't regret it.
Why don't you get some rest?
We have a lot to talk about, son.
You've turned into me.
Ana huh?
I'd like to leave in the morning.
You're on your way?
Where will you go?
You just got here, son.
♪ And in this state ♪
I've got to go, Ma.
You're like Ertugrul...
Will you seal your lips against us, son?
Secrets hide secrets, Mother.
Every secret covered up...
It's a new pain.
If it's a new one...
...a harbinger of new secrets.
What secret do I have to tell you...
Is it gonna be ointment?

text: Merhem değil, sırlarım yarana tuz olur
english: It's not ointment, it's my secret. It's salt in your wound.
Don't do this to me, Ma.
Keep my secrets a secret.
I'll just keep them.
Just so you know...

text: …babamın da, Oğuz atamın da şerefine leke çalmadım
english: I have not dishonored my father, nor my father, nor my father Oğuz.

text: Bunu bil ve duanı benden esirgeme ana
english: Know that and don't spare me your prayers, Mother.
Let's get some rest.
Give me your blessing, Mother.
I hope to return with good news.
Whatever way you're going with Sungur...
Good luck with that, son.
May my blessings be with you.
Go quickly and come soon.

text: Bilesin ki bizim yolumuz ateş-i aşk yoludur ana
english: You should know that our path is the path of fire and love, Mother.

text: Bu yolda bir katre şule olmak isteyen kullarıyız Mevla’nın
english: We are the servants of Mevla, who want to be a mule on this road.
Beyond that, it's forbidden to us.
I'll give you my blessing.
May Allah be with you.
May God be with you.
You got it?
I got it, Dad.

text: Yemekte bir ara Gökçe’yle içeriye girdik
english: At dinner, we went in with Gökçe.
I got the seal.
Look.
It's beautiful.
Yeah.

text: Hah. Bunu da Efrasiyab Tebriz’den getirdi
english: And he brought this from Tebriz.
That's even better.
Yes, it's beautiful.

text: Daha neler var Bak, sana ne göstereceğim
english: Look what's left, I'll show you.
I'll be right there.
Okay.

text: Artık uç beyliğinin vakti geldi Gayrı bunun dönüşü yoktur
english: It's time for the mastery of flight But there's no turning back
God bless you, brother.
But this seal
The seal of Oğuz Khan, Aytolun
What do you say, Dad?

text: Nice hanların, sultanların peşinde koştuğu bu mührü…
english: This seal, which many inn and sultans pursue...
...You're going to give it to Dog?

text: Hayatta her şeyin bir bedeli vardır kızım
english: There's a price to pay for everything in life, girl.
I paid the price.
Now it's time for the Saadettin Dog
Brother

text: Gideceğiz ya Doğan’ın aklı iyice gitmiştir
english: We'll go. Doğan's mind is gone.
She won't be able to see my sister.
...he's got a stroke like a stallion on a stick.

text: İnşallah bir gün sen de aşk ateşinde yanarsın Bamsı
english: I hope one day you'll burn in the fire of love, Bacsi.

text: Yanarsın da o zaman anlarsın dünya kaç bucakmış
english: You'll get burned, then you'll know what the world will look like.
Repent, brother, repent.

text: Sen aklını ayran aşıyla mı kemirdin?
english: Did you eat your mind with a buttermilk shot?

Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, oh, God, oh, God, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh,

Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, oh, God, oh, God, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh,
Brother, it's like you don't know
I'm married to my trash.
I like my horse 'cause he's a kid.
My master says die, I die

text: Yolunu şaşıran bir ok menzilinden çıkmış bir mızrak…
english: A spear out of the range of an arrow that's lost its way.

text: …kardeş dur, yolun buraya kadardır diyene kadar…
english: ...bro, stop, until you say it's all the way here...
I'd like to thank you.

text: Her cengimiz de gerdeğimizdir çok şükür
english: Every battle is our wedding. Thank God.
Thanks, bro.

text: Yarın yine bize yol göründü kardeş
english: We've got another road tomorrow, brother.
Let's see what battles wait for us

text: He kardeş Bakalım ne cenkler bekler
english: Brother, let's see what wars await
That's crazy.

text: Kardeş, Aykız bacımı ayrı tutarım Bilirsin
english: Brother, I keep my sister apart You know
I know, I know
Go to sleep, brother.
Thank God we have Ertugrul Bey
Well, there is.
We won't have time to burn with our pain.
Did you say something, brother?
God rest your soul.
You too, brother. You too.

text: Her şey Noyan’ın istediği gibi oldu
english: Everything happened the way Noyan wanted it to.
Inshallah, inshallah
Calm down. It's me.
What are you doing here?
Noyan leaves no man behind

text: O vakit siz de beni bu obadan çıkarmanın bir yolunu bulun. Bulun ki…
english: Then find a way to get me out of this room.

text: …ben de, Noyan da sizlere minnettar olalım
english: ...I'd like to thank you and Noyan.

text: Sabah nöbetçiler değişene kadar kaçtığımı anlamazlar
english: In the morning, the guards won't know I'm on the run until they change.

text: Siz de beni bu obadan çıkarmanın bir yolunu bulun
english: You find a way to get me out of this room.
Welcome.
Welcome, brother.
Noyan would want you with him.
He got what he wanted.
May God guide you, Ertuğrul.
Amen.

text: Her nereye gidiyorsan hayırlısıyla git Tez gidip tez dönesin
english: Wherever you're going, go with the best, you'll be back soon.
May you have your loved ones.
I don't want you to put your heart into it, brother.

text: İnşallah döner dönmez her şeyi anlatacağım sana
english: I hope I'll tell you everything as soon as I get back.
Inshallah, brother. Inshallah.
Giddyup!
We're ready, sir.
Wait, wait, wait.
Shh, shh, shh!
Give me your blessing, my lord.

text: İnşallah tüccar Birlikte daha büyük işler yapacağız
english: Let's hope we'll do bigger things together, trader.

text: Sizin gibi dürüst, işini yapan Türkler oldukça…
english: As honest as you are, the Turks doing their job are quite...
...everybody's a winner, sir.

text: Beni bağışlama. Lakin dediğin gibi değersiz kanımla da toprağı kirletme
english: Don't forgive me, but like you said, don't soil the soil with my worthless blood.
Let me avenge Abdurrahman

text: Bana, kardeşlerine ettiğin bunca ihanetten sonra…
english: After all you've betrayed me to your brothers...
How can I believe you, Hamza?

text: Sana Noyan’ın kellesini getirmek isterim beyim
english: I'd like to bring you Noyan's head, sir.

text: Bu uğurda ölürsem kanım sana da, toprağa da helaldir
english: If I die for this, my blood is lawful to you and to the earth.

text: Lakin sana daha fazlasını da verebilirim
english: But I can give you more.

text: Obada bir hain daha var beyim
english: There's another traitor in the Obada, sir.
Why did you come here?

text: Ama bilesin ki seni de beni de Noyan’a o götürecektir
english: But know that he will take you and me to Noyan.
Who's that?
Trader Efrasiab

text: Bu zamana kadar obayla ilgili o kadar çok haber taşıdı ki…
english: He's carried so much news about the oba...

text: …sana da, obaya da çok zarar verdi
english: He's done a lot of damage to you and the oba.

text: Dilersen onu ve adamlarını yakala, konuştur
english: Catch him and his men if you want, and talk to them.
You'll see I'm right.

text: Kararın her ne olursa olsun, kanım sana helaldir beyim. Hakkını helal et
english: Whatever you decide, my blood is lawful to you, my lord.

text: Hamza bak bu dediklerin de yalansa…
english: Hamza, if what you're saying is a lie...

text: …yarına bırakmam şuracıkta alırım senin kelleni, bilmiş ol
english: I won't let you go tomorrow. I'll take your head right now.
Everything I say is true, my lord.
Then

text: bu gece seni bu çadırdan kaçıracağım
english: Tonight I'm gonna break you out of this tent.
You'll go straight to Ephraim.
You'll finish what Abdurrahman left behind.
Do you understand?
Get out of the way.
I'm with you till my last breath, my lord.
God bless you.
Have a nice trip.
Thank you, sir.
Giddyup!
Giddyup!
Giddyup!
Giddyup!
Giddyup!
